title: Enhancing Competencies in Utilizing Interactive Technologies in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing and operating secondary education curricula, with basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Design optimization for online learning in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, enabling pre-/in-service secondary teachers to acquire higher education interaction skills applicable in field settings

learning_goals: Learners can design online discussions and collaborative activities using various interactive technology tools
Learners can independently diagnose and apply problem-solving procedures during technical failures, and share solutions with peer teachers
Learners can develop mobile-optimized interactive tasks to propose methods that improve learner engagement by over 30%
Learners can establish strategies to build trust-based relationships with learners using digital communication tools

resources: Mobile-compatible interactive tools (Padlet, Google Classroom mobile app, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
